attributes.action: Give a referendum on the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Myself and many others feel the British people should be given our 'democratic right' to have our say on the Lisbon Treaty through referendum. We feel that in substance it is the same as the European Constitution and has major implications for this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
